descriptionlist.description:
A great tweak to avoid awkward situations.
How it works: - Wake up your phone, stay on the lock screen. - Press any volume key twice. ATTENTION! you need to press FAST!
A fake incoming call will appear after the time you specified in the settings. The subscriber's name is also indicated in the settings. The background of the call (the voice of the interlocutor, noise around or silence) is also selected in the settings.
ATTENTION! The fake call will disappear if you unlock the screen.
